All Classes

Class Description
AntiFlagModeGame
Game Mode: Users cannot flag
AtomicModeGame
Game Mode: Un-flagged bombs continually explode with a set time interval, scrambling and undoing nearby progress
AutomatedBoardModeGame
Game Mode: Cells of the board reveal themselves with a set time interval, having a 5% chance of being a bomb
BoardGUI
Handler for all board GUI functionality
BuildAWallModeGame
Game Mode: Cells which are not bombs are "walled" with a set time interval, allowing less easy progress
ClimateChangeModeGame
Game Mode: Board changes shapes every move, between square and hexagon
ControlPanelGUI
Handler for all control panel GUI functionality
CrazyHouseModeGame
Game Mode: Board scrambles all unvisited cells after each move
Game
Abstract class to handle all gameplay
GameStatus
Stores the status of the game
Global
Stores all variables which must be accessed by all classes
HexagonAntiFlagUnitTest
Unit Test for hexagonal anti flag mode
HexagonAtomicUnitTest
Unit Test for hexagonal atomic mode
HexagonAutomatedUnitTest
Unit Test for hexagonal automated board mode
HexagonBoard
The board which handles hexagonal placements and neighbors
HexagonBoardGUI
Board GUI to handle hexagonal labels and layout
HexagonBuildAWallUnitTest
Unit Test for hexagonal build a wall mode
HexagonClimateChangeUnitTest
Unit Test for hexagonal climate change mode
HexagonCrazyHouseUnitTest
Unit Test for hexagonal crazy house mode
HexagonLabel
Class to handle hexagonal labels
HexagonLayout
Handles the layout of all hexagonal labels for the board
HexagonMineTickUnitTest
Unit Test for hexagonal mine tick mode
HexagonNormalUnitTest
Unit Test for hexagonal normal mode
IconHandler
Handles translating strings to icons (images) from files
Main
Driver class to run to play the game
MinesweeperBoard
The board which handles generic placements and neighbors, abstracted to allow for different board shapes
MinesweeperGUI
Overall GUI handler for entire screen
MineTickModeGame
Game Mode: A mine is added to the board each time the user makes a move
NormalModeGame
Game Mode: Classic minesweeper
SquareAntiFlagUnitTest
Unit Test for square anti flag mode
SquareAtomicUnitTest
Unit Test for square atomic mode
SquareAutomatedUnitTest
Unit Test for square automated board mode
SquareBoard
The board which handles square placements and neighbors
SquareBoardGUI
Board GUI to handle square labels and layout
SquareBuildAWallUnitTest
Unit Test for square build a wall mode
SquareClimateChangeUnitTest
Unit Test for square climate change mode
SquareCrazyHouseUnitTest
Unit Test for square crazy house mode
SquareMineTickUnitTest
Unit Test for square mine tick mode
SquareNormalUnitTest
Unit Test for square normal mode
Test
Class to run unit tests from
TriangleAntiFlagUnitTest
Unit Test for triangle anti flag mode
TriangleAtomicUnitTest
Unit Test for triangle atomic mode
TriangleAutomatedUnitTest
Unit Test for triangle automated board mode
TriangleBoard
The board which handles triangular placements and neighbors
TriangleBoardGUI
Board GUI to handle triangular labels and layout
TriangleBuildAWallUnitTest
Unit Test for triangle build a wall mode
TriangleClimateChangeUnitTest
Unit Test for triangle climate change mode
TriangleCrazyHouseUnitTest
Unit Test for triangle crazy house mode
TriangleLayout
Handles the layout of all triangular labels for the board
TriangleLeftLabel
Class to handle left-sided triangular labels
TriangleMineTickUnitTest
Unit Test for triangle mine tick mode
TriangleNormalUnitTest
Unit Test for triangle normal mode
TriangleRightLabel
Class to handle right-sided triangle labels
UnitTest
Abstract class to be overridden with various different games to test on
